        public boolean closeAccount(int accountNum)
        used to close an account at the bank
        Parameters:
        accountNum - number of the account that needs to be closed
        Returns:
        true if the account is closed and false if it is not

      • depositAccount

        public boolean depositAccount(int accountNum,
                              double amount)
        used to deposit money into an account in the bank
        Parameters:
        accountNum - number of the bank account
        amount - amount that needs to be deposited into the account
        Returns:
        returns true if the money is deposited and false if it is not

      • withdrawlAccount

        public boolean withdrawlAccount(int accountNum,
                                double amount)
        used to withdrawl money from an account in the bank
        Parameters:
        accountNum - number of the account to be withdrawn from
        amount - amount to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        true if withdrawn and false if not
